segments.text: My heart is pounding just watching this unfolding drama.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading across the floor, making it incredibly slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is definitely going to slip and fall, I just know it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And that poor woman, standing right in the middle of it all, could be the first victim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then thereâ€™s the boy, teetering precariously on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His grip on the cookie jar seems strong, but the stool legs are so splayed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move, and he'll come crashing down, possibly with broken dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him falling makes me truly anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is also quite close, she could get caught in the fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire scene is a series of accidents waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could reach in and stop it all from escalating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a terrifying ballet of everyday objects and unawareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope everyone remains safe despite the obvious hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR
